short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Key binds to scroll a half page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For those who love to use the space bar to scroll pages, this extension binds [Ctrl + Space] to scroll a half page down, and [Shift + Ctrl + Space] to scroll a half page up by default.

You can change those binds at the options page.
[Space]
- Browser's default
- Scroll a half page

[Ctrl + Space]
- Browser's default
- Scroll a half page
- Scroll a page
